titleStmt.title: William Penn, the pretended Quaker discovered to hold a correspondence with the Jesuite's at Rome to which is added A winding sheet for Ann Docwra / by Francis Bugg.
titleStmt.author: Bugg, Francis, 1640-1724?

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: stained, with print show-through and loss of print.
